sentence.Network_en: Many passages in Scripture allude to this concept .
sentence.Network_cn: 圣经中有许多经文间接地提到这样的概念。

sentence.Network_en: He did not even allude to his brother's engagement to Mary.
sentence.Network_cn: 他兄弟与玛丽订婚的事他只字未提.

sentence.Network_en: In your remarks you allude to certain sinister development.
sentence.Network_cn: 你在讲话中暗示某种不祥的事要发生.

新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... allowance n. 定量 allude vi. 暗示，间接提到 ally n. 同盟.

list.abs: However people alludes more poverty that are her ., 然而人们提及更多的是她的贫穷.

Fluxnet : only confirmed are what's been seen in screenshots. however , as you allude , there have been a wide variety of level types in the concept art .能确定的只有那些解途中出现过的场景。但是，正如你提及的，他们在概念画/美工图中有过各种各样的环境。
Prospero alludes to the fact that Caliban once to rape Miranda .普洛斯彼罗暗示到事实那一个丑陋曾经尝试掠夺米兰达。
In your remarks you alluded to a certain sinister design ., 在你的谈话中你提到了某个阴谋.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'hint at, suggest'): from Latin alludere, from ad- 'towards' + ludere 'to play'

entry.def: If you allude to something, you mention it in an indirect way.

example.ex: She also alluded to her rival's past marital troubles.
example.tran: 她还影射了对手过去的婚姻问题。

means.word_mean: 1. make a more or less disguised reference to;

sentences.sentence: "He alluded to the problem but did not mention it"

auth_sentence.content: Quotations which allude to the Perjuries of the Fair.
auth_sentence.res_content: Quotations which allude to the Perjuries of the Fair.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Quotations which allude to the Perjuries of the Fair.

auth_sentence.content: Note the article did not allude to that.
auth_sentence.res_content: Note the article did not allude to that.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Note the article did not allude to that.

auth_sentence.content: Band members freely allude to recruitment as one of their goals.
auth_sentence.res_content: Band members freely allude to recruitment as one of their goals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Band members freely allude to recruitment as one of their goals.

means.word_mean: 提及, 暗指,  间接提到, 影射

sentences.en: In your remarks you alluded to a certain sinister design.
sentences.cn: 在你的谈话中, 你提到了某个阴谋。
